hero.description: Remove the background from any image in seconds. Fast, precise, and 100% free for all your design needs worldwide.

uploader.title: Upload your image
uploader.description: Drag and drop an image here, or click to select a file (JPG, PNG, WebP)
uploader.clickToStart: Click the button below to start
uploader.error: Failed to remove background. Please try again later.

features.title: Why Choose RemoveBG?
features.subtitle: The best solution to remove photo backgrounds quickly, easily, and professionally.

items.title: 100% Automatic
items.description: Our AI technology detects subjects and removes backgrounds instantly without manual selection.

items.title: High Quality
items.description: Smooth and precise cutouts, preserving hair details and object edges exceptionally well.

items.title: Free Forever
items.description: Use this tool as much as you want without subscription fees or hidden costs. Truly free.

items.title: Fast & Efficient
items.description: The background removal process takes only a few seconds. Save your valuable time.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Everything you need to know about our service.

items.question: Is RemoveBG really free?
items.answer: Yes, RemoveBG is completely free to use. You can upload and remove backgrounds as many times as you want at no cost.

items.question: What image formats are supported?
items.answer: We support popular image formats such as JPG, JPEG, PNG, and WebP.

items.question: Will the image quality decrease?
items.answer: We strive to maintain the original image quality as much as possible. The final result will have the same resolution as the image you uploaded.

items.question: What about the privacy of my photos?
items.answer: Your security is our priority. The photos you upload are only processed to remove the background and will not be stored permanently on our servers.

items.question: Do I need to register an account?
items.answer: No need. You can use our service directly without having to register or log in.
